title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: North Korea has warned the U.S. would be "seriously mistaken" to ignore the regime's year-end deadline for resuming nuclear talks.The remark came from Kim Yong-chol, the Vice Chairman of North Korea's ruling Workers' Party.In a statement released Sunday on the North's state-run Korean Central News Agency, Kim said the close ties between President Donald Trump and Kim Jong-un alone are not enough.He said no substantial progress has been made between North Korea and the U.S. administrations and QUOTE-"an exchange of fire" could happen at any moment.Pyeongyang has previous warned of serious consequences if Washington does not engage in talks with a different attitude by the end of this year.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
